original_title: Head-on collision kills three of same family
original_body_lines: Three individuals of the same family were killed when a three-wheeler collided head-on with a tipper truck at Thulhiriya on the Colombo-Kurunegala road early this morning.
Police said the father (40), mother (39) and their son (13) were killed in the tragedy which occurred while they were returning home after attending a funeral in Galle.
The tipper-truck driver was arrested in connection with the accident. (Pushpakumara Mallawaarchchi)
